author: CTPPS
body:
Backport of #23577 

This PR updates the DQM:
* Includes new CTPPS Roman Pot (RP) state (with CTPPSRecord collection) in function of LS. Each state corresponds to a combination of (HV & LV & position for physics).
* States are 0 (not used), 1 (bad), 2 (warning) and 3 (ok).

A test python is available at DQM/CTPPS/test/timing_dqm_test_cfg.py

@dfigueiredo @nminafra @fabferro
title: CTPPS: updated DQM for 2018 data taking [10_1_X]
